description:
Get ready to meet charming girls posing in seductive and stylish outfits that emphasize their unique appeal! Every detail in the game is carefully designed so that you can feel the realism of assembling a real puzzle. With each new level, you will see more and more candid and intriguing images. Relax and enjoy every step on the way to completing the masterpiece!

Features:
• Delightful girls in daring and sophisticated outfits
• Fascinating and simple gameplay that captivates you from the first minutes
• The ability to study each image in detail after assembly
• Different puzzle difficulty
• Atmospheric music
name: Hentai Waifu
intro: A puzzle with charming girls drawn in anime style!
